title: Text Area
reference-overview: A Text Area is a form input field that gives the user the ability to enter a large amount of text.
reference-usage: Use the Text Area element when a user is required to enter a large amount of text on a form. For shorter content, use the Text Input element.
reference-details:
• Text Area should default to the Attention/Highlight border color when the user clicks inside the field.
